entry.title: Evan Buckley's (Unhepful) Guide to Parallel Universes
entry.summary:
Author: Monogums

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,065Chapters: 5/13Kudos: 23

Summary: When Buck has a brush with death, the last thing he expects is to wake up with a new identity. Or deal with zombies. Or the paparazzi. But life can be strange. Especially his, apparently. - Or: in which Buck lives a series of parallel lives after a near-death experience. Somehow, Eddie is there. Every. Time.

entry.title: Even though my dizzy head is numb, I swear my heart is never giving up (you‚Äôre the reason, the only reason)
entry.summary:
Author: lovelyluke

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,794Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 162

Summary: ‚ÄúYour name is Buck?‚Äù Eddie asks, watching as Buck carefully nodded ‚ÄúMy boyfriend‚Äôs name is also Buck.‚Äù ‚ÄúOh,‚Äù Buck sighs as he carefully lifts Eddie. ‚ÄúHow‚Äî hum, What is he like?‚Äù ‚ÄúOh,‚Äù Eddie‚Äôs face lights up instantly ‚ÄúBuck is the best boyfriend in the world!‚Äù He adds with a warm smile ‚ÄúHe‚Äôs kind, and he‚Äôs funny, and he‚Äôs smart, and he‚Äôs so beautiful. I swear to God, he‚Äôs the most beautiful man on earth.‚Äù ‚ÄúOh yeah?‚Äù Buck asks softly, a discreet blush growing on his face. ‚ÄúBuck, stop fishing for compliments,‚Äù Hen mutters as they load into the ambulance. ‚ÄúHe wants to tell me about his amazing boyfriend Buck, just let him." ‚ÄúYou‚Äôre taking advantage of a concussed man,‚Äù Hen retorts. ‚ÄúHe‚Äôs keeping him alert,‚Äù ¬† Or, Eddie has a concussion, and he can't recognize Buck.

entry.title: To show you I love you.
entry.summary:
Author: in_lovewithbuck

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,589Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 87

Summary: ‚ÄúThat‚Äôs Bobby, I should go, it was nice to meet you and Chris, I‚Äôll see you around, and hopefully not at a house fire next time.‚Äù He laughs as he walks away, backwards, almost falling flat on his ass tripping over his own feet, his captain catching him before he falls.Eddie chuckles and goes into the house to find Chris.‚Äî‚ÄúCustomer satisfaction is high on our priority list,‚Äù Buck repeats in the cabin of the fire engine, ‚ÄúWhy did I say that‚Äù he says with his head buried in his hands.‚ÄúI think the worst part is when you almost fell flat on your back‚Äù Bobby says through his headset.‚ÄúCan‚Äôt believe I missed that part.‚Äù Chimney laughs with Hen and Ravi.‚ÄúGuys it‚Äôs not funny, I‚Äôm normally alright talking to people, I just had to talk to his kid to stop from going bright red.‚Äù Buck says, making them all cackle more.‚ÄúBuck, I think you just got a bit flustered, he was attractive, and I like girls.‚Äù Hen tries to comfort him.OREddie keeps needing the firefighter. Which is how he meets buck, everything moves pretty fast after that, but Eddie has a secret that everyone except Buck knows.

entry.title: kiss in the kitchen (like it's a dancefloor)
entry.summary:
Author: freshlemonade

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,511Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 121

Summary: ‚ÄúYou still down for dinner though? I can get us some beers. I mean I was going to make this low sodium cod but Hen‚Äôs not coming so maybe I could do a miso glaze or‚Äî‚Äù Eddie doesn‚Äôt know what compels him but the words fall out of his mouth before he can catch them. ‚ÄúCan we dance?‚Äù He asks, softly, almost like a whisper. He really needs to dance. He feels restless. He‚Äôs worried about Hen, he‚Äôs worried about his feelings towards Buck, he‚Äôs pretty sure Chris made friends with the high school stoner so he‚Äôs worried about that, and on top of it all, his car is showing the check engine light so that‚Äôs just another thing on his plate. He needs to just put all his attention to dancing. ‚ÄúWhat?‚Äù ‚ÄúI mean,‚Äù he sputters. God, this is embarrassing. He is a fully grown man feeling like he‚Äôs on the brink of a panic attack if he doesn‚Äôt dance. ‚ÄúNo it‚Äôs okay, um- miso cod sounds great.‚Äù Buck cracks a small smile. ‚ÄúYou want to dance?‚Äù ¬† orEddie teaches Buck samba

entry.title: Catch Me, Please
entry.summary:
Author: ALittleSideProject

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 42,094Chapters: 11/34Kudos: 119

Summary: And all of that was why, on their seventeenth day on Mars, Buck had shoved Eddie out of the way during the emergency evacuation, knowing it meant his own death instead of Eddie‚Äôs. Buck trusted Eddie to help get everyone else home, and Eddie had someone to go home for. Someone who needed him and loved him. Someone who Buck loved, even without ever meeting. He wasn‚Äôt going to let Chris grow up without a father. So in the split second he had to think after seeing the communications dish flying at them through the storm that was chasing them off the planet fourteen days early, he‚Äôd pushed Eddie out of the way, hoping like hell it would be enough and knowing he wouldn‚Äôt live long enough to find out. -- Or, take the basic plot of The Martian and stick the 911 characters in there, slap on a lot more angst and pining, and wrap it all up with plenty of recovery cuddling. | Fic is complete at ~120k words and posting 2-3x a week as I edit.

entry.title: still on the line
entry.summary:
Author: whisperingcherries

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 34,173Chapters: 25/25Kudos: 9

Summary: buck runs a late-night podcast that‚Äôs a little chaotic and way more honest than he ever means it to be. people call in anonymously, talk about the things they don‚Äôt say out loud, and somehow leave feeling a little less alone. eddie is just a voice on the line at first. steady, quiet, familiar in a way buck can‚Äôt explain. he calls when it matters. he listens when it hurts. this is a story about laughter in the dark, about staying on the line, and about falling in love before you even know who you‚Äôre talking to.
